choices.text:
explain use of LLM's in AI research
LLM's(Large Language Models) are a class of AI models that have revolutionized the field of NLP. They have enabled Researchers to build more sophisticated models, leading to breakthroughs in various applications like chatbots or virtual assistants. These advancements have been instrumental in shaping our understanding towards human-like conversational agents capable enough for consumers looking forwardto purchasing such agents(LLM's).
